00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[] )
00029 {
00030         cout << "Filling Global Software Event Number" << endl;
00031         cout << "The number of arguments should be 3. You passed in " << argc << endl;
00032         for(Int_t i = 0; i < argc; i++){
00033                 cout << argv[i];
00034         }
00035         cout << endl << endl;
00036         
00037         TString inEDSFile = argv[1];
00038         TString outFile = argv[2];
00039         cout << "Input file         " << inEDSFile.Data() << endl;
00040         cout << "Output file        " << outFile.Data() << endl;
00041         
00042         KDataWriter fOutEds(outFile.Data());
00043         KEvent *eout = fOutEds.GetEvent();
00044         KHLAEvent *mEvOut =  dynamic_cast<KHLAEvent*>( eout );
00045         
00046         KDataReader fInEds(inEDSFile.Data());
00047         KEvent *ein = fInEds.GetEvent();
00048         KHLAEvent *mEvIn = dynamic_cast<KHLAEvent *>( ein );
00049         
00050         if(mEvOut == 0) return -1;
00051         if(mEvIn == 0) return -1;
00052         
00053         Int_t fGSEventNumber = 0;       
00054         
00055         do
00056         {
00057                 mEvOut->Clear("C");
00058                 
00059                 *mEvOut = *mEvIn;
00060                 
00061                 mEvOut->IsSame(*mEvIn, true); //is there a problem with the copy? 
00062                 
00063                 mEvOut->SetGSEventNumber(fGSEventNumber++);
00064                 
00065                 fOutEds.Fill();
00066                 
00067                 if(fGSEventNumber % 50000 == 0)
00068                         cout << "Processing event " << fGSEventNumber << " out of " << fInEds.GetEntries() << endl;
00069                 
00070                 
00071                 
00072         } while(fInEds.GetNextEntry() > 0);
00073         
00074         
00075         fInEds.Close();
00076                 
00077         fOutEds.Write();
00078         fOutEds.Close();
00079         
00080         return 1;
00081 }
